price: 113. Ken cisab kee galto numul matan yi-Rabbiy qellittem yaaxigel tan tet akke waytek, woh axiginnitoonuy amah axcuk mananniton.
arabic: إِنۡ حِسَابُهُمۡ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّيۖ لَوۡ تَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: in ḥisābuhum illā ʿalā rabbī law tashʿurūna
